summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 57th Street, from 40th Avenue Northeast to 43rd Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12456 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
